Text:
So where the hell in the description does it say that this has descriptive audio?  NO WHERE!  

Thanks a lot but I do not need someone describing everything that's happening on screen.  Can't seem to turn it off.

Comment never showed up so I'll try again.  This seems to have described video, in which throughout the movie it is described by a narrator.

I tried different media players and all sorts of options to turn this off, but no dice.
